instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-02020: What is 820-02020? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Liquid damaged <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-02020</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> stuck at 5v.  <SIGNAL>PPBUS_AON</SIGNAL> pulsing to 12.3v
threads.message:
UD560 looked heavily corroded so I have removed, cleaned and reseated.
There is nothing powering it, pin 6 voltage <SIGNAL>P3V3_S2SW_SNS</SIGNAL> is zero.
I can see <SIGNAL>PPBUS_AON</SIGNAL> pulsing to 12.3volts
<CHIP>U5200</CHIP> ISL9240HI and surrounding components reflowed to no effect.
